name: Tap Fruit Blast
description:
You can find plenty of juicy fruits in this fruit factory! Tap on 2 or more delicious fruits of the same to make luscious fruits splashing in hundreds of uniquely puzzling levels. Achieve your mission to collect hidden sleeping piggies before run out of moves.
No switch and swap, only tap!

Features:
♥ Pop fruit cubes in the same color to blast
♥ Collect enough fruit cubes or lovely sleeping piggies to reach the level goals
♥ Tap more than 5 of the same fruits to create special powerful boosters: rocket, bomb or rainbow!
♥ Journey across 5 splendid maps: Fruit Terrace, Sky wheatland, Melon Pasture, Aurantium Park, Ice Meadow
♥ Various of fun tasks and level targets 
♥ Super addictive game to relax your mind
♥ Hard to master. Practice your skills.

Pop cubes and blast fruits for FREE now!!
